channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: In a Michigan parking lot, a truck driver repeatedly rams a car in a seemingly random attack; on a remote road in Oklahoma, motorcyclists get into an altercation with the driver of a pickup truck who calls in a sibling and a neighbor for backup.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: Drinks are thrown, fists fly and a car is rammed during an argument at a Houston intersection; a lane change miscalculation turns into a nightmare when a semi truck rolls over on a highway; two drivers settle their differences in a refreshing way.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Road Wars
channel.desc: In Canton, Ohio, a horn honk on the road allegedly leads to a man wreaking havoc on a woman's car; in Jonesboro, Ark., chaos ensues when a suspect manages to break free from his handcuffs and holds a lighter flame to the seat.
